title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Gauteng govt hands out sanitiser at densely populated women’s hostel in Alex

content:
The Gauteng government handed out sanitiser at a densely populated women’s hostel in Alexandra on Wednesday in a bid to minimise the spread of Covid-19.
